title: Mariko, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ; ULQ
description: two travelers enjoying a meal inside a small restaurant; a waitress with baby on back serves the customers; a third traveler departs with his hat and cape at L; trees with small blossoms in foreground and middle ground; rolling mountain in back
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
